article.headline: Bank of America Corp. stock rises Wednesday, outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Bank of America Corp. BAC, +0.47% rose 2.09% to $24.88 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 1.74% to 3,419.44 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 1.91% to 28,303.46. Bank of America Corp. closed $10.84 below its 52-week high ($35.72), which the company achieved on December 27th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM, -0.57% rose 1.74% to $99.73, Wells Fargo & Co. WFC, rose 2.61% to $24.81, and Citigroup Inc. C, +0.47% rose 0.97% to $44.84. Trading volume (46.9 M) remained 9.9 million below its 50-day average volume of 56.8 M.
